Package eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.commons.wrappers

Class PaginationInfo

java.lang.Object
eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.commons.wrappers.PaginationInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PaginationInfo extends Object implements Serializable
This class is auxiliary and contains pagination information to accompany lists returned in ResponseWrappers.
Since:
version 0.3.0
Author:
Angela-Maria Despotopoulou [Athens, Greece]
